name: Solonoid
description:
Quality is terrible on HTML5, so I highly recommend the downloaded versions!  I am on a Mac, so Window/Linux users, please let me know if those files are working!  This game is entirely 2D, but is made to look 3D with a skew effect and normal maps with lighting.

Controls are WASD to move and Arrows to aim and shoot by default.  You can change this on the CONTROLS page from the title screen.  alternatively, you can press space to shoot. 

I didn't finish so much, but I am pretty proud of what I did finish! There are only 4 levels :(.  let me know if you want more, I have plans!

BUGS:

1.  If you quit to the Title or finish the 4th level, the game thinks you are on the 4th level but just makes you play lvl 1 repeatedly until you restart the game/browser.

CREDITS:

MUSIC:  

DOS-88

SHADERS:

Chromatic Abberation - John Watson - Gravity Ace

Dissolve - Pend00 - Godot Shaders

Title Screen Moving Grid - jospic - Godot Shaders

Transition/Glitch - Ombarus - Godot Shaders

ART:

Inspired by Kenny Assets - Simple Space, though I made the tilemap and remade most of the sprites.

Normal Maps for lighting were made with Laigter by azagaya - Itch.io

SOUNDS:

Basically the entire Kenny Assets Audio library + some sounds I recorded myself.  None were use straight out of the box though, I edited many sounds together and applied effects using Waveform Free and Audacity.
